name: One is the Stoogiest Number
description:
One is the Stoogiest Number

Congratulations! Your band has landed a dream gig! You have been preparing for this your entire life. Get ready for a life of superstardom!

One issue: you are the only member of your band to show up. You cannot look like a fool in front of the audience! Do not let the audience know that it is only you on stage! Fight the intense gravitational pull on your arms and play through three different instruments to keep the crowd satisfied!

Controls:

Use "Q" and "W" to raise your left arm

Use "A" and "S" to lower your left arm

Use "O" and "P" to raise your right arm

Use "K" and "L" to lower your right arm

Use "Space" to interact with your hands

Use the "Left" and "Right" Arrow Keys to move between instruments.

Use "Escape" to quit

Features:
  • 2D
  • Music
  • Difficulty settings
  • Crowd Reactions

This is a student project for INFSCI1061 at the University of Pittsburgh and a submission for the Oakland University's Homeschool GameJam

Attributions:

  • Instruments from "Rockstar Asset Pack" on the Unity Store
  • Curtain Sprite: https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/theater-stage-red-curtains-realistic-vector_1371860.htm
  • Crowd silhouette: https://www.freepnglogos.com/pics/crowd
  • Crowd noises found on freesound.org

Some ditties are based on:

  • "One" as performed by Three Dog Night
  • "Für Elise" by Ludwig van Beethoven
  • "Jesu, Joy of Man's Desiring" by Johann Sebastian Bach
  • "X's Call" a number of songs by Austin Jorgensen
